channel.title: MetalLB on Kubernetes By Example
channel.description: Recent content in MetalLB on Kubernetes By Example

item.description: Guided Exercise: Installing Metallb on a Minikube Cluster In this exercise, you will deploy the MetalLB add-on on a minikube cluster. Outcomes You should be able to: Create a minikube instance. Get the DHCP network parameters of the minikube VM driver. Enable and configure the MetalLB minikube add-on. Create an example deployment and LoadBalancer service. Access the service with the external IP address provided by MetalLB.
MetalLB MetalLB is a load balancer suitable for local environments, it is included as an add-on in minikube. https://metallb.universe.tf/ Home Next
